MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH46 postcode area of West Linton. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far, we have identified an overhead line fault in West Linton and we now expect your supply to be restored by 12.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:12am on Friday, 19 February 2021
